main event: An Air Force captain and his wife observed seven yellowish-orange flying objects in Hampton, Virginia on 11 August 1952.
interesting points: The objects were observed in three series of two, four, and one, flying at an estimated speed of 400 mph,The first sighting occurred around 2130 EST while they were in a vehicle,The captain estimated the altitude of the first two objects to be about 500 feet,One object was seen flying extremely low, skimming the treetops,The objects emitted a steady yellowish-orange light and all flew in the same direction as the wind.
witness description: Air Force captain and his wife
